title: SPICY error: Linkage 'Z' contains negative distances
body:
I do not know , if there is anything here to do with this error. My data is mainly between 0-1, except a few. My data does not have any negative numbers, but there are  data rows containing 0 in some columns..

```
clustering = shap.utils.hclust(X, y)
shap.plots.bar(shap_values, clustering=clustering)
```
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-18-dd7f435887b5> in <module>
----> 1 shap.plots.bar(shap_values, clustering=clustering)

~\Anaconda3\envs\gpa\lib\site-packages\shap\plots\_bar.py in bar(shap_values, max_display, order, clustering, cluster_threshold, show)
    102 
    103             # now relax the requirement to match the parition tree ordering for connections above cluster_threshold
--> 104             dist = scipy.spatial.distance.squareform(scipy.cluster.hierarchy.cophenet(partition_tree))
    105             feature_order = get_sort_order(values, dist, clust_order, cluster_threshold, feature_order)
    106 

~\Anaconda3\envs\gpa\lib\site-packages\scipy\cluster\hierarchy.py in cophenet(Z, Y)
   1670     """
   1671     Z = np.asarray(Z, order='c')
-> 1672     is_valid_linkage(Z, throw=True, name='Z')
   1673     Zs = Z.shape
   1674     n = Zs[0] + 1

~\Anaconda3\envs\gpa\lib\site-packages\scipy\cluster\hierarchy.py in is_valid_linkage(Z, warning, throw, name)
   2266                                  name_str)
   2267             if (Z[:, 2] < 0).any():
-> 2268                 raise ValueError('Linkage %scontains negative distances.' %
   2269                                  name_str)
   2270             if (Z[:, 3] < 0).any():

ValueError: Linkage 'Z' contains negative distances.
```
